text:
Talkwalker (http://www.talkwalker.com/) is hiring in Luxembourg City, Europe, Full-time, Onsite. (VISA possible for strong candidates)

We do social media monitoring, including crawling and indexing more than 300 million articles a day.

We are searching for java (backend and frontend) and javascript (frontend) engineers to join our growing team.

Please contact me by email (Thibaut Britz, t.britz@talkwalker.com) if you are interested.
